description: Find email address for a contact. Accepts FindSingleEmailInput with firstName (required, String), lastName (required, String), domain (optional, String) OR website (optional, String) - at least one required. Uses two-step approach: first tries email finder, then email verifier if finder fails. Returns SingleEmailResponse with email (String or null), source (enum: finder, verifier, null), confidence (Float). Uses LambdaEmailClient for Lambda Email service. Credits: 1 credit deducted per search (FreeUser/ProUser only, Admin/SuperAdmin unlimited). Activity logged (non-blocking).
graphql_operation: mutation FindSingleEmail($input: FindSingleEmailInput!) { email { findSingleEmail(input: $input) { email source confidence } } }
